track_types.name: Short
track_types.description: An oval racetrack that is less than 1 mile in length.

track_types.name: Intermediate
track_types.description: An oval that is greater than 1 mile in length, but less than 2 miles in length.

track_types.name: Superspeedway
track_types.description: A racetrack that is greater than 2 miles in length.

track_types.name: Road Course
track_types.description: A racing circuit comprised of left- and right-hand turns, as opposed to an oval which is comprised exclusively of left-hand turns.
